articles.title: Dublin's super league dreams show farce not US import - RTE.ie
articles.description: The Americans have proven a handy scapegoat for the Super League in the UK press and while the latest plans bore their imprint, ideas around Super Leagues and franchises long pre-date their direct involvement.
